message.body: I'm sorry if I put you in an awkward position last night when I got pissed about your housemates wanting to head home right away
I should've just rolled my eyes at the irony and kept my thoughts to myself I suppose
:) no worries... I would have stayed out but they were my ride
It was kinda awkward at the end there :)
They were both acting weird with me all night, and then when they got whiny about being tired I was admittedly pissed off
#### is crancky cause he eats very little these days and its mostly crappy diet food so he has no energy
I also didn't particularly enjoy sitting between them at the movie considering neither of them seemed particularly happy about being there
He never wants to do anythjng
Really?
Neither of them seemed happy the whole night
At least not when I was around
I finally just assumed I'd done something to piss them off and figured I'd wait for them to tell me what I'd done
And then next thing I knew I was sitting right between them thinking well, this is going to be a fun two hours

I enjoyed myself anyway, but the night definitely did not have the vibe I was hoping for. It figures that on a night when I'm finally in a really great mood and have lots of energy, everyone else is miserable
Anyway, I just wanted to apologize for making things awkward.

Don't worry about it. It wasn't awkward for me. They are both cranky lately for different reasons, but believe me it has nothing to do with you. ##### is lonely, ##### is lonely and have no energy because of this stupid diet. So they are both a less than enthusiastic and never have any energy. I should of taking my own car to be honest.
Sigh
Did you guys end up going out after we left?
yes
It was fun, but I wish you guys had been there
Well there you go at least some people went
Awww :) I wish we did too
I'm trying really hard not to make this whole moving thing into a big deal, but
I'll make them go next time I promise
You know, I only have so many more nights left to spend time with my friends
No I totally understand.
This can't be easy
And jesus, I understand feeling lonely
Believe me
It's not that I don't sympathize
yeah it's also not helping that it's in the winter everyone seems to be a little more down at this time of the year
I expect I'll sympathize even more in the very near future when I'm sitting in my apartment in the middle of freaking Connecticut ;)
Anwyay, I'll get over it
Everything's kind of amplified for me right now but my reaction was stillâ€¦ hmm, what's the word
disproportional
All things considered, you get a pass :-)
heh
thanks
and now I will return to writing about the vaccines that adults need to get and completely ignore
thanks for, y'know, letting me ramble somewhat incoherently
